articles.title: Kevin Hart's personal shopper charged with stealing over $1 million from comedian - USA TODAY
articles.description: Kevin Hart's former personal shopper, Dylan Jason Syer, was indicted on grand larceny charges for allegedly stealing more than $1 million.

articles.author: Luke Kenton
articles.title: Springsteen's DWI report claims he took 45 steps during 'walk and turn' instead of the instructed 18 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Details from the November 14 police report show that the 71-year-old singer was swaying and glassy-eyed, smelt of alcohol and took 45 steps instead of the requested 18.
articles.content:
Bruce Springsteen took 45 steps instead of the requested 18 when he was arrested on suspicion of DWI, refused a breath test and 'strongly smelt of alcohol', according to a New Jersey police report.

articles.title: Game Of Thrones prequel series House Of The Dragon about Targaryen civil war casts four more names - Daily Mail
articles.description: Steve Toussaint, Sonoya Minuzo, Eve Best and Rhys Ifans have been cast in a Game Of Thrones spin-off series. House Of The Dragon takes place in the same universe as Game Of Thrones.
articles.content:
